mapper.select: select * from sys02_user, sys21_license_code , emp02_license where emp02_user_id = sys02_user_id and emp02_license_cd = sys21_license_cd and sys21_apply_date = ( select max(x.sys21_apply_date) from sys21_license_code x where x.sys21_license_cd = emp02_license_cd and x.sys21_apply_date < NULLIS(emp02_issue_date, sysdate) ) and emp02_license_id = #{licenseId}

select * from sys02_user, sys21_license_code , emp02_license where emp02_user_id = sys02_user_id and emp02_license_cd = sys21_license_cd and sys21_apply_date = ( select max(x.sys21_apply_date) from sys21_license_code x where x.sys21_license_cd = emp02_license_cd and x.sys21_apply_date < NULLIS(emp02_issue_date, sysdate) ) and emp02_user_id = #{userId}

select * from sys02_user, sys21_license_code a, emp01_hire, emp02_license where emp02_user_id = sys02_user_id and sys02_company_id = #{companyId} and sys02_user_id = emp01_user_id and sysdate between nvl(emp01_hire_date, sysdate) and nvl(emp01_retire_date, to_date('29991231', 'yyyymmdd')) and emp02_license_cd = sys21_license_cd and sys21_apply_date = ( select max(x.sys21_apply_date) from sys21_license_code x where x.sys21_apply_date <= sysdate and x.sys21_license_cd = emp02_license_cd) order by sys02_kor_nm, sys21_license_nm
